title: Lost: Apple Watch Series 6 in Gateway South
content: I lost my Apple Watch Series 6 in Gateway South near the fountain. It has a silver aluminum case with a white sport band. If found, please contact me. The watch has a scratch on the screen.

title: Found: Set of Keys near Gateway North
content: I found a set of keys near Gateway North. It includes a car key, a house key, and a few others. Contact me with a description to claim.

title: Lost: Black Leather Jacket in the city park
content: I lost my favorite black leather jacket in the city park near the main entrance. It has a small rip on the left sleeve. Reward offered for its return.

title: Found: Silver Bracelet on the beach
content: Found a silver bracelet on the beach near the lifeguard tower. Describe it to claim.

title: Lost: Dell Laptop Bag in the office cafeteria
content: I left my black Dell laptop bag in the office cafeteria. It contains my laptop, charger, and important documents. Reward offered for its return.

title: Found: Sunglasses on the bus
content: Found a pair of sunglasses on the bus. Contact me with a description to claim.

title: Lost: iPhone with Blue Case near the train station
content: I lost my black iPhone with a cracked screen near the train station. It has a blue case with a white pattern on it. Reward offered for its return.

title: Found: Wallet in the shopping mall
content: Found a wallet in the shopping mall near the food court. Please provide identification to claim.

title: Lost: Blue Umbrella in the office lobby
content: I lost my blue umbrella with a wooden handle in the office lobby near the reception area. Reward offered for its return.

title: Found: Necklace near the Playground in the park
content: Found a necklace in the park near the playground. Describe it to claim.

title: Lost: Nike Backpack at the gym
content: I lost my black Nike backpack at the gym near the locker rooms. It contains my workout clothes and water bottle. Reward offered for its return.

title: Found: Watch near the coffee shop
content: Found a watch near the coffee shop. Identify the brand and color to claim.

title: Lost: Watch in Samuel C. Williams Library
content: I lost my smartwatch in the Stevens Institute of Technology library. It was last seen on one of the study tables upstairs, where it’s quieter. I was really upset because I used it all the time to keep track of my classes and deadlines. After realizing it was missing, I sent out an email to everyone, hoping someone might have picked it up and could return it. I even tried the watch’s tracking feature, but it only showed the last place it was before going offline. I guess it’s a lesson learned to keep a closer watch on my stuff, especially in busy places like the library!
